第一章 基础算法

快读

手写快读

inline char Nowchar() {
    static char buf[1 << 20], *p1 = buf, *p2 = buf;
    bool flag = (p1 == p2) && (p2 = (p1 = buf) + fread(buf, 1, 1 << 20, stdin), p1 == p2);
    return flag ? EOF : *p1++;
}
inline int Read() {
    int x = 0, f = 1;
    static char c = Nowchar();
    for (; c > '9' || c < '0'; c = Nowchar()) {
        if (c == '-') f = -1;
    }
    for (; c <= '9' && c >= '0'; c = Nowchar()) {
        x = (x << 3) + (x << 1) + c - 48;
    }
    return x * f;
}

排序

快速排序

AcWing785.快速排序

手写快速排序

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
const int N = 1e5 + 5;
int a[N];
void quick_sort(int a[], int l, int r) {
    if (l >= r) return;
    int i = l - 1, j = r + 1, x = a[i + j >> 1];
    while (i < j) {
        do i++; while(a[i] < x);
        do j--; while(a[j] > x);
        if (i < j) swap(a[i], a[j]);
    }
    quick_sort(a, l, j);
    quick_sort(a, j + 1, r);
}
int main() {
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i ++) cin >> a[i];
    quick_sort(a, 0, n - 1);
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cout << a[i] << " ";
    return 0;
}

归并排序

AcWing787.归并排序

使用归并排序将数组按从小到大排序

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
const int N = 1e5 + 5;
int a[N], b[N];
void merge_sort(int l, int r) {
    if (l >= r) return;
    int mid = l + r >> 1;
    merge_sort(l, mid), merge_sort(mid + 1, r);
    int i = l, j = mid + 1;
    for (int k = l; k <= r; k++) {
        if (j > r || i <= mid && a[i] <= a[j]) b[k] = a[i++];
        else b[k] = a[j++];
    }
    for (int k = l; k <= r; k++) a[k] = b[k];
}
int main() {
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> a[i];
    merge_sort(0, n - 1);
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cout << a[i] << " ";
    return 0;
}

二分

整数二分

AcWing789.数的范围

在一个有序数列中找到大于等于x的第一个数和最后一个数

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
const int N = 1e5 + 5;
int a[N];
int main() {
    int n, q, k;
    cin >> n >> q;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) cin >> a[i];
    while (q--) {
        cin >> k;
        int l = 0, r = n - 1;
        while (l < r) {
            int mid = l + r >> 1;
            if (a[mid] >= k) r = mid;
            else l = mid + 1;
        }
        if (a[r] != k) {
            cout << -1 << " " << -1 << endl;
            continue;
        } else cout << r << " ";
        l = 0, r = n - 1;
        while (l < r) {
            int mid = l + r + 1 >> 1;
            if (a[mid] <= k) l = mid;
            else r = mid - 1;
        }
        cout << r << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

浮点数二分

AcWing790.数的三次方根

二分答案

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
const double eps = 1e-7;
double pow(double x) {
    return x * x * x;
}
int main() {
    double n;
    cin >> n;
    double l = -1e4, r = 1e4;
    while (r - l > eps) {
        double mid = (l + r) / 2;
        if (pow(mid) > n) r = mid;
        else l = mid;
    }
    printf("%.6lf\n", r);
    return 0;
}

高精度

高精度加法

AcWing791.高精度加法

大整数+大整数

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
vector<int> add(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {
    if (A.size() < B.size()) return add(B, A);
    vector<int> C;
    int t = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < A.size(); i++) {
        t += A[i];
        if (i < B.size()) t += B[i];
        C.push_back(t % 10);
        t /= 10;
    }
    if (t) C.push_back(t);
    return C;
}
int main() {
    string a, b;
    cin >> a >> b;
    vector<int> A, B;
    for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) A.push_back(a[i] - '0');
    for (int i = b.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) B.push_back(b[i] - '0');
    vector<int> C = add(A, B);
    for (int i = C.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) cout << C[i];
    return 0;
}

高精度减法

AcWing792.高精度减法

大整数-大整数

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
bool cmp(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {
    if (A.size() != B.size()) return A.size() > B.size();
    for (int i = A.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        if (A[i] != B[i]) return A[i] > B[i];
    }
    return true;
}
vector<int> sub(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {
    vector<int> C;
    for (int i = 0, t = 0; i < A.size(); i++) {
        t = A[i] - t;
        if (i < B.size()) t -= B[i];
        C.push_back((t + 10) % 10);
        if (t < 0) t = 1;
        else t = 0;
    }
    while (C.size() > 1 && C.back() == 0) C.pop_back();
    return C;
}
int main() {
    string a, b;
    cin >> a >> b;
    vector<int> A, B;
    for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) A.push_back(a[i] - '0');
    for (int i = b.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) B.push_back(b[i] - '0');
    vector<int> C;
    if (cmp(A, B)) C = sub(A, B);
    else C = sub(B, A), cout << '-';
    for (int i = C.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) cout << C[i];
    return 0;
}

高精度乘法

AcWing793.高精度乘法

高精度*低精度

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
vector<int> mul(vector<int> A, int b) {
    vector<int> C;
    for (int i = 0, t = 0; i < A.size() || t; i++) {
        if (i < A.size()) t += A[i] * b;
        C.push_back(t % 10);
        t /= 10;
    }
    while (C.size() > 1 && C.back() == 0) C.pop_back();
    return C;
}
int main() {
    string a;
    int b;
    vector<int> A;
    cin >> a >> b;
    for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) A.push_back(a[i] - '0');
    vector<int> C = mul(A, b);
    for (int i = C.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) cout << C[i];
    return 0;
}

AcWing793.高精度乘法

高精度*高精度

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
vector<int> mul(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {
    vector<int> C(A.size() + B.size(), 0);
    for (int i = 0; i < A.size(); i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < B.size(); j++) {
            C[i + j] += A[i] * B[j];
        }
    }
    for (int i = 0, t = 0; i < C.size(); i++) {
        t += C[i];
        C[i] = t % 10;
        t /= 10;
    }
    while (C.size() > 1 && C.back() == 0) C.pop_back();
    return C;
}
int main() {
    string a, b;
    cin >> a >> b;
    vector<int> A, B;
    for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) A.push_back(a[i] - '0');
    for (int i = b.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) B.push_back(b[i] - '0');
    vector<int> C = mul(A, B);
    for (int i = C.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) cout << C[i];
    return 0;
}

高精度除法

AcWing794.高精度除法

高精度/低精度

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
vector<int> div(vector<int> &A, int b, int &r) {
    vector<int> C;
    r = 0;
    for (int i = A.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        r = r * 10 + A[i];
        C.push_back(r / b);
        r %= b;
    }
    reverse(C.begin(), C.end());
    while (C.size() > 1 && C.back() == 0) C.pop_back();
    return C;
}
int main() {
    string a;
    int B;
    vector<int> A;
    cin >> a >> B;
    for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) A.push_back(a[i] - '0');
    int r;
    vector<int> C = div(A, B, r);
    for (int i = C.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) cout << C[i];
    cout << endl << r << endl;
    return 0;
}

高精度加法状态压缩

AcWing791.高精度加法

高精度+高精度，状态压缩提高速度

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
const int base = 100000000;
vector<int> add(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {
    if (A.size() < B.size()) return add(B, A);
    vector<int> C;
    int t = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < A.size(); i++) {
        t += A[i];
        if (i < B.size()) t += B[i];
        C.push_back(t % base);
        t /= base;
    }
    if (t) C.push_back(t);
    return C;
}
int main() {
    string a, b;
    cin >> a >> b;
    vector<int> A, B;
    int j = 0, s = 0, t = 1;
    for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        s += (a[i] - '0') * t;
        j++, t *= 10;
        if (j == 8 || i == 0) {
            A.push_back(s);
            s = j = 0;
            t = 1;
        }
    }
    for (int i = b.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        s += (b[i] - '0') * t;
        j++, t *= 10;
        if (j == 8 || i == 0) {
            B.push_back(s);
            s = j = 0;
            t = 1;
        }
    }
    vector<int> C = add(A, B);
    cout << C.back();
    for (int i = C.size() - 2; i >= 0; i--) printf("%08d", C[i]);
    return 0;
}

AcWing792.高精度减法

高精度-高精度，状态压缩提高速度

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
const int base = 100000000;
bool cmp(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {
    if (A.size() != B.size()) return A.size() > B.size();
    for (int i = A.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        if (A[i] != B[i]) return A[i] > B[i];
    }
    return true;
}
vector<int> sub(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {
    vector<int> C;
    for (int i = 0, t = 0; i < A.size(); i++) {
        t = A[i] - t;
        if (i < B.size()) t -= B[i];
        C.push_back((t + base) % base);
        if (t < 0) t = 1;
        else t = 0;
    }
    while (C.size() > 1 && C.back() == 0) C.pop_back();
    return C;
}
int main() {
    string a, b;
    cin >> a >> b;
    vector<int> A, B;
    int j = 0, s = 0, t = 1;
    for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        s += (a[i] - '0') * t;
        j++, t *= 10;
        if (j == 8 || i == 0) {
            A.push_back(s);
            s = j = 0;
            t = 1;
        }
    }
    for (int i = b.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        s += (b[i] - '0') * t;
        j++, t *= 10;
        if (j == 8 || i == 0) {
            B.push_back(s);
            s = j = 0;
            t = 1;
        }
    }
    vector<int> C;
    if (cmp(A, B)) C = sub(A, B);
    else C = sub(B, A), cout << '-';
    cout << C.back();
    for (int i = C.size() - 2; i >= 0; i--) printf("%08d", C[i]);
    return 0;
}

高精度乘法状态压缩

AcWing793.高精度乘法

高精度*高精度，状态压缩提高速度

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
using namespace std;
#define int long long 
const int base = 100000000;
vector<int> mul(vector<int> &A, vector<int> &B) {
    vector<int> C(A.size() + B.size(), 0);
    for (int i = 0; i < A.size(); i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j < B.size(); j++) {
            C[i + j] += A[i] * B[j];
        }
    }
    for (int i = 0, t = 0; i < C.size(); i++) {
        t += C[i];
        C[i] = t % base;
        t /= base;
    }
    while (C.size() > 1 && C.back() == 0) C.pop_back();
    return C;
}
signed main() {
    string a, b;
    cin >> a >> b;
    vector<int> A, B;
    int j = 0, s = 0, t = 1;
    for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        s += (a[i] - '0') * t;
        j++, t *= 10;
        if (j == 8 || i == 0) {
            A.push_back(s);
            s = j = 0;
            t = 1;
        }
    }
    for (int i = b.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
        s += (b[i] - '0') * t;
        j++, t *= 10;
        if (j == 8 || i == 0) {
            B.push_back(s);
            s = j = 0;
            t = 1;
        }
    }
    vector<int> C = mul(A, B);
    cout << C.back();
    for (int i = C.size() - 2; i >= 0; i--) printf("%08lld", C[i]);
    return 0;
}

前缀和与差分

一维前缀和

AcWing795.前缀和

求序列任意区间的和

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
#define int long long
const int N = 1e5 + 5;
int a[N], sum[N];
signed main() {
    int n, m;
    cin >> n >> m;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cin >> a[i];
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) sum[i] = sum[i - 1] + a[i];
    while (m--) {
        int l, r;
        cin >> l >> r;
        cout << sum[r] - sum[l - 1] << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

二维前缀和

AcWing796.子矩阵的和

求矩阵任意子矩阵的和

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
const int N = 1005;
int a[N][N], sum[N][N];
int main() {
    int n, m, q;
    cin >> n >> m >> q;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) cin >> a[i][j];
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {
            sum[i][j] = sum[i - 1][j] + sum[i][j - 1] - sum[i - 1][j - 1] + a[i][j];
        }
    }
    while (q--) {
        int x1, y1, x2, y2;
        cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2;
        cout << sum[x2][y2] - sum[x1 - 1][y2] - sum[x2][y1 - 1] + sum[x1 - 1][y1 - 1] << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

一维差分

AcWing797.差分

维护序列区间加
询问序列区间和

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
const int N = 1e5 + 5;
int a[N], b[N], sum[N];
void insert(int l, int r, int c) {
    b[l] += c;
    b[r + 1] -= c;
}
int main() {
    int n, m;
    cin >> n >> m;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cin >> a[i];
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) b[i] = a[i] - a[i - 1];
    while (m--) {
        int l, r, c;
        cin >> l >> r >> c;
        insert(l, r, c);
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) sum[i] = sum[i - 1] + b[i];
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cout << sum[i] << " ";
    return 0;
}

二维差分

AcWing798.差分矩阵

维护矩阵子矩阵加
询问矩阵子矩阵和

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
const int N = 1005;
int a[N][N], b[N][N], sum[N][N];
void insert(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2, int c) {
    b[x1][y1] += c;
    b[x2 + 1][y1] -= c;
    b[x1][y2 + 1] -= c;
    b[x2 + 1][y2 + 1] += c;
}
int main() {
    int n, m, q;
    cin >> n >> m >> q;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) cin >> a[i][j];
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {
            insert(i, j, i, j, a[i][j]);
        }
    }
    while (q--) {
        int x1, y1, x2, y2, c;
        cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2 >> c;
        insert(x1, y1, x2, y2, c);
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {
            sum[i][j] = sum[i - 1][j] + sum[i][j - 1] - sum[i - 1][j - 1] + b[i][j]; 
        }
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {
            cout << sum[i][j] << " ";
        }
        cout << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

离散化

AcWing802.区间和

数的范围太大，不能作为数组的下标
数的个数较小，能作为数组的下标
讲数映射为数组下标，通过数组下标找的原来的数，从而实现离散化

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <algorithm>
using namespace std;
const int N = 300010;
typedef pair<int, int> pii;
#define fi first
#define se second
vector<int> v;
vector<pii> add, query;
int a[N];
int find(int x) {
    return lower_bound(v.begin(), v.end(), x) - v.begin() + 1; 
}
int main() {
    int n, m;
    cin >> n >> m;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        int x, c;
        cin >> x >> c;
        add.push_back({x, c});
        v.push_back(x);
    }
    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
        int l, r;
        cin >> l >> r;
        query.push_back({l, r});
        v.push_back(l);
        v.push_back(r);
    }
    sort(v.begin(), v.end());
    v.erase(unique(v.begin(), v.end()), v.end());
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        int j = find(add[i].fi);
        a[j] += add[i].se;
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= v.size(); i++) {
        a[i] += a[i - 1];
    }
    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
        int l = find(query[i].fi);
        int r = find(query[i].se);
        cout << a[r] - a[l - 1] << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

模拟

麻将算法

2021ICPC昆明K.Riichi!!

模拟打麻将，丢掉什么牌在摸到什么牌后能赢
暴力枚举对子来判断牌是否是赢的状态
暴力枚举丢的牌和摸的牌

#include <iostream>
#include <vector>
#include <unordered_map>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
typedef pair<int, int> pii;
int a[5][10];
unordered_map<char, int> ctn;
char s[30];
bool check() {
    for (int i = 1; i <= 3; i++) {
        int A = 0, B = 0;
        for (int j = 1; j <= 9; j++) {
            int temp = a[i][j] - A - B;
            if (temp < 0) return false;
            temp %= 3;
            B = A, A = temp; 
        }
        if (A + B != 0) return false; 
    }
    for (int j = 1; j <= 8; j++) {
        if (a[4][j] && a[4][j] % 3) return false;
    }
    return true;
}
bool judge() {
    for (int i = 1; i <= 4; i++) {
        int sum = 0;
        for (int j = 1; j <= 9; j++) sum += a[i][j];
        if (sum % 3 != 2) continue;
        for (int j = 1; j <= 9; j++) {
            if (a[i][j] < 2) continue;
            a[i][j] -= 2;
            bool flag = check();
            a[i][j] += 2;
            if (flag) return true;
        }
    }
    return false;
}
void oper(vector<pii> &ans, int x, int y) {
    a[x][y]--;
    for (int i = 1; i <= 4; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= 9; j++) {
            a[i][j]++;
            if (judge()) ans.push_back({i, j});
            a[i][j]--;
        }
    }
    a[x][y]++;
}
void opt(int x, int y) {
    static int ntc[] = {' ', 'w', 'b', 's', 'z'};
    printf("%d%c", y, ntc[x]);
}
int main() {
    ctn['w'] = 1; ctn['b'] = 2;
    ctn['s'] = 3; ctn['z'] = 4;
    int T;
    scanf("%d", &T);
    while (T--) {
        scanf("%s", s + 1);
        memset(a, 0, sizeof a);
        for (int i = 1; i <= 28; i += 2) a[ctn[s[i + 1]]][s[i] - '0']++;        
        if (judge()) puts("Tsumo!");
        else {
            vector<pii> ans[5][10];
            for (int i = 1; i <= 4; i++) {
                for (int j = 1; j <= 9; j++) {
                    if (a[i][j]) oper(ans[i][j], i, j);
                }
            }
            int res = 0;
            for (int i = 1; i <= 4; i++) {
                for (int j = 1; j <= 9; j++) {
                    if (ans[i][j].size()) res++;
                }
            }
            printf("%d\n", res);
            for (int i = 1; i <= 4; i++) {
                for (int j = 1; j <= 9; j++) {
                    if (ans[i][j].size()) {
                        opt(i, j);
                        printf(" ");
                        for (auto it : ans[i][j]) opt(it.first, it.second);
                        puts(""); 
                    }
                } 
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}

第二章 动态规划

线性DP

洛谷P107摆花

计数类dp, 求c0 + c1 + c2 + … + cn = m, (0 <= ci <= ai)的方案数

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
const int N = 105, mod = 1e6 + 7;
int a[N], f[N][N];
int main() {
    int n, m;
    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf("%d", &a[i]);
    f[0][0] = 1;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        for (int j = 0; j <= m; j++) {
            for (int k = 0; k <= min(j, a[i]); k++) {
                f[i][j] = (f[i][j] + f[i - 1][j - k]) % mod;
            }
        }
    }
    printf("%d\n", f[n][m]);
    return 0;
}

区间DP

区间染色模型

2021ICPC昆明站C.Cities

一个颜色序列，要求把他染成同一种颜色，每次只能染连续相同的颜色为另一种颜色，求最小染色次数、
定义f[i][j]表示将区间[i, j]染成同一种颜色的所有方案中染色次数最小的方案的染色次数。
状态转移：f[i][j] = min(f[i][j - 1] + 1, f[i][k] + f[k + 1][j]) k为与a[j]颜色相同的位置 

#include <iostream>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
const int N = 5e3 + 5;
int a[N], pre[N], lst[N], f[N][N];
int main() {
    int T;
    scanf("%d", &T);
    while (T--) {
        int n;
        scanf("%d", &n);
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
            scanf("%d", &a[i]);
            if (a[i] == a[i - 1]) {
                i--, n--;
                continue;
            }
            lst[a[i]] = 0;
        }
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
            pre[i] = lst[a[i]];
            lst[a[i]] = i;
        }
        memset(f, 0, sizeof f);
        for (int len = 2; len <= n; len++) {
            for (int i = 1; i + len - 1 <= n; i++) {
                int j = i + len - 1;
                f[i][j] = f[i][j - 1] + 1;
                for (int k = pre[j]; k >= i; k = pre[k]) {
                    f[i][j] = min(f[i][j], f[i][k] + f[k + 1][j]);
                }
            }
        } 
        printf("%d\n", f[1][n]);
    }
    return 0;
}

状压DP

Codeforce 11 D.A Simple Task

用状态压缩DP计算无向图简单环的数量
用二进制来表示所有集合，通过将状态压缩为整数来达到优化转移的目的。

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
#define int long long
const int N = 19;
int g[N + 5][N + 5];
int f[(1 << N) + 5][N + 5];
int n, m;
int lowbit(int x) {
    for(int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        if(x & (1 << i)) return i;
    }
    return -1;
}
signed main() {
    int ans = 0;
    scanf("%lld%lld", &n, &m);
    for (int i = 0; i < m; i++) {
        int u, v;
        scanf("%lld%lld", &u, &v);
        u--, v--;
        g[u][v] = g[v][u] = 1;
    }
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) f[1 << i][i] = 1;
    for (int S = 1; S < (1 << n); S++) {
        for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) { 
            if (!f[S][i]) continue;
            int p = lowbit(S);
            for (int j = p; j < n; j++) {
                if (!g[i][j]) continue;
                if (S & (1 << j)) {
                    if (j == p) ans += f[S][i];
                } else f[S | (1 << j)][j] += f[S][i];
            }
        }
    }
    ans = (ans - m) / 2;
    printf("%lld\n", ans);
    return 0;
}

树形DP

基础树形DP

洛谷P1352 没有上司的舞会

每个结点有一个价值
父节点选了子节点就不能选
求选结点的所有方案中价值最大的是多少

#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
const int N = 6e3 + 5;
int h[N], e[N], ne[N], idx;
bool st[N], vis[N];
int f[N][2];
void add(int a, int b) {
    e[idx] = b, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++;
}
void dfs(int u) {
    vis[u] = 1;
    for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {
        int j = e[i];
        if (vis[j]) continue;
        dfs(j);
        f[u][1] += f[j][0];
        f[u][0] += max(f[j][0], f[j][1]);
    }
}
int main() {
    int n;
    scanf("%d", &n);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) scanf("%d", &f[i][1]);
    memset(h, -1, sizeof h);
    for (int i = 1; i < n; i++) {
        int a, b;
        scanf("%d%d", &a, &b);
        add(b, a);
        st[a] = 1;
    }
    int res = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        if (!st[i]) {
            dfs(i);
            res = max(f[i][0], f[i][1]);
            break;
        }
    }
    printf("%d\n", res);
    return 0;
}

树上背包

洛谷P2014 [CTSC1997]选课

每个结点有一定的价值
父节点选了才能选子节点
问选M个结点的所有方案中价值最大是多少

#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
const int N = 305;
int h[N], e[N], ne[N], idx;
int f[N][N];
int n, m;
void add(int a, int b) {
    e[idx] = b, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++;
}
int dfs(int u) {
    int p = 1;
    for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {
        int v = e[i];
        int sz = dfs(v);
        for (int j = min(p, m + 1); j; j--) {
            for (int k = 1; k <= sz && k + j <= m + 1; k++) {
                f[u][k + j] = max(f[u][k + j], f[u][j] + f[v][k]);
            }
        }
        p += sz;
    }
    return p;
}
int main() {
    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);
    memset(h, -1, sizeof h);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        int k;
        scanf("%d%d", &k, &f[i][1]);
        add(k, i);
    }
    dfs(0);
    printf("%d\n", f[0][m + 1]);
    return 0;
}

换根DP

洛谷P3478 [POI2008]STA-Station

给定一个n个点的树，请求出一个结点，使得以这个结点为根时，所有结点的深度之和最大。
一个结点的深度之定义为该节点到根的简单路径上边的数量。

#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <cstring>
using namespace std;
#define int long long
const int N = 1e6 + 5, M = N * 2;
int h[N], e[M], ne[M], idx;
int sz[N], d[N];
int f[N];
int n;
void add(int a, int b) {
    e[idx] = b, ne[idx] = h[a], h[a] = idx++; 
}
int dfs1(int u, int fa) {
    sz[u] = 1;
    d[u] = d[fa] + 1;
    for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {
        int j = e[i];
        if (j == fa) continue;
        sz[u] += dfs1(j, u);
    }
    return sz[u];
}
void dfs2(int u, int fa) {
    for (int i = h[u]; ~i; i = ne[i]) {
        int j = e[i];
        if (j == fa) continue;
        f[j] = f[u] - sz[j] * 2 + n;
        dfs2(j, u);
    }
}
signed main() {
    scanf("%lld", &n);
    memset(h, -1, sizeof h);
    for (int i = 0; i < n - 1; i++) {
        int a, b;
        scanf("%lld%lld", &a, &b);
        add(a, b), add(b, a);
    }
    dfs1(1, 1);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) f[1] += d[i];
    dfs2(1, 1);
    int sum = f[1], res = 1;
    for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {
        if (f[i] > sum) {
            sum = f[i];
            res = i;
        }
    }
    printf("%lld\n", res);
    return 0;
}

第三章 数据结构

单调队列

AcWing154.滑动窗口

求序列连续k个数的最大值和最小值

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
const int N = 1e6 + 5;
int a[N];
int q[N], hh, tt;
int main() {
    int n, k;
    cin >> n >> k;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) cin >> a[i];
    hh = 0, tt = -1;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        if (hh <= tt && i - k + 1 > q[hh]) hh++;
        while (hh <= tt && a[q[tt]] >= a[i]) tt--;
        q[++tt] = i;
        if (i >= k) cout << a[q[hh]] << " ";
    }
    cout << endl;
    hh = 0, tt = -1;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        if (hh <= tt && i - k + 1 > q[hh]) hh++;
        while (hh <= tt && a[q[tt]] <= a[i]) tt--;
        q[++tt] = i;
        if (i >= k) cout << a[q[hh]] << " ";
    }
    cout << endl;
    return 0;
}

单调栈

洛谷P1950 长方形

单调栈可以在O(n)的时间内求出一个数左/右边比他小/大的第一个数

#include <iostream>
#include <stack>
using namespace std;
const int N = 1005;
int n, m;
int a[N][N];
int l[N], r[N], h[N];
long long ans;
void workl() {
    stack<int> stk;
    for (int i = m; i >= 1; i--) {
        while (stk.size() && h[i] <= h[stk.top()]) {
            l[stk.top()] = i;
            stk.pop();
        }
        stk.push(i);
    }
    while (stk.size()) {
        l[stk.top()] = 0;
        stk.pop();
    }
}
void workr() {
    stack<int> stk;
    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
        while (stk.size() && h[i] < h[stk.top()]) {
            r[stk.top()] = i;
            stk.pop();
        }
        stk.push(i);
    }
    while (stk.size()) {
        r[stk.top()] = m + 1;
        stk.pop();
    }
}
void work() {
    workl();
    workr();
    for (int i = 1; i <= m; i++) {
        ans += (i - l[i]) * (r[i] - i) * h[i];
    }
}
int main() {
    char c;
    scanf("%d%d", &n, &m);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {
            cin >> c;
            if (c == '*') a[i][j] = 1;
        }
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) {
            h[j]++;
            if (a[i][j]) h[j] = 0;
        }
        work();
    }
    printf("%lld\n", ans);
    return 0;
}

二叉树

二叉树的建立

给前序和中序建立二叉树

数据结构与算法题目集 7-23 还原二叉树

const int N = 60;
int pre[N], in[N];
int v[N], lc[N], rc[N], idx;
int reduce(int ps, int is, int ie) {
    int u = pre[ps];
    v[++idx] = u;
    int id = idx, k = 0;
    for (int i = is; i <= ie; i++) {
        if (in[i] == u) break;
        k++;
    }
    if (k == ie - is + 1) return 0;
    if (k != 0) lc[id] = reduce(ps + 1, is, is + k - 1);
    if (k != ie - is) rc[id] = reduce(ps + k + 1, is + k + 1, ie);
    return id;
}

给后序和中序建二叉树

团体程序设计天梯赛-练习集 L2-006 树的遍历

const int N = 60;
int in[N], post[N];
int v[N], lc[N], rc[N], idx;
int reduce(int ps, int pe, int is, int ie) {
    int u = post[pe];
    v[++idx] = u;
    int id = idx, k = 0;
    for (int i = is; i <= ie; i++) {
        if (in[i] == u) break;
        k++;
    }
    if (k == ie - is + 1) return 0;
    if (k != 0) lc[id] = reduce(ps, ps + k - 1, is, is + k - 1);
    if (k != ie - is) rc[id] = reduce(ps + k, pe - 1, is + k + 1, ie);
    return id;
}

int ne[M];

int main() {
    cin >> m >> p + 1 >> n >> s + 1;
    for (int i = 2, j = 0; i <= m; i++) {
        while (j && p[i] != p[j + 1]) j = ne[j];
        if (p[i] == p[j + 1]) j++;
        ne[i] = j;
    }
    for (int i = 1, j = 0; i <= n; i++) {
        while (j && s[i] != p[j + 1]) j = ne[j];
        if (s[i] == p[j + 1]) j++;
        if (j == m) {
            cout <<  i - m << " ";
            j = ne[j];
        }
    }
    return 0;
}

Trie

Trie维护字符串集合

AcWing835.Trie字符串统计

维护字符串集合
插入字符串
查询字符串出现的次数

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
const int N = 1e5 + 5;
int son[N][26], cnt[N], idx;
char str[N];
void insert(char str[]) {
    int p = 0;
    for (int i = 0; str[i]; i++) {
        int u = str[i] - 'a';
        if (!son[p][u]) son[p][u] = ++idx;
        p = son[p][u];
    }
    cnt[p]++;
}
int search(char str[]) {
    int p = 0;
    for (int i = 0; str[i]; i++) {
        int u = str[i] - 'a';
        if (!son[p][u]) return 0;
        p = son[p][u];
    }
    return cnt[p];
}
int main() {
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    string op;
    while (n--) {
        cin >> op >> str;
        if (op == "I") insert(str);
        else cout << search(str) << endl;
    }
    return 0;
}

Trie解决最大异或对

AcWing143.最大异或对

在一堆数中以nlog(n)时间内找到最大异或对

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
const int N = 1e5 + 5, M = 31 * N;
int son[M][2], idx;
void insert(int x) {
    int p = 0; 
    for (int i = 30; i >= 0; i--) {
        int u = x >> i & 1;
        if (!son[p][u]) son[p][u] = ++idx;
        p = son[p][u];
    }
}
int search(int x) {
    int p = 0, res = 0;
    for (int i = 30; i >= 0; i--) {
        int u = x >> i & 1;
        if (son[p][!u]) {
            res = res * 2 + !u;
            p = son[p][!u];
        } else {
            res = res * 2 + u;
            p = son[p][u];
        }
    }
    return res;
}
int main() {
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    int res = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        int a;
        cin >> a;
        insert(a);
        int t = search(a);
        res = max(res, a ^ t);
    }
    cout << res << endl;
    return 0;
}

小根堆

AcWing839.模拟堆

手写小根堆

#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
const int N = 100010;
int h[N], ph[N], hp[N], idx;
void heap_swap(int a, int b) {
    swap(h[a], h[b]);
    swap(ph[hp[a]], ph[hp[b]]);
    swap(hp[a], hp[b]);
}
void down(int u) {
    int t = u;
    if (u * 2 <= idx && h[u * 2] < h[t]) t = u * 2;
    if (u * 2 + 1 <= idx && h[u * 2 + 1] < h[t]) t = u * 2 + 1;
    if (u != t) {
        heap_swap(u, t);
        down(t);
    }
} 
void up(int u) {
    while (u / 2 && h[u] < h[u / 2]) {
        heap_swap(u, u / 2);
        u /= 2;
    }
} 
int main() {
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    int m = 0;
    while (n--) {
        string op;
        int x, k;
        cin >> op;
        if (op == "I") {
            cin >> x;
            idx++, m++;
            h[idx] = x;
            ph[m] = idx, hp[idx] = m;
            up(idx);
        } else if (op == "PM") {
            cout << h[1] << endl;
        } else if (op == "DM") {
            heap_swap(1, idx);
            idx--;
            down(1);
        } else if (op == "D") {
            cin >> k;
            k = ph[k];
            heap_swap(k, idx);
            idx--;
            down(k), up(k);
        } else {
            cin >> k >> x;
            k = ph[k];
            h[k] = x;
            down(k), up(k);
        } 
    }
    return 0;
}
